headline: Pfizer (PFE) CEO’s Struggling Because Of “a Good Hand,” Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 12 Stocks on Jim Cramer’s Radar. Pfizer Inc. (NYSE:PFE) is one of the stocks on Jim Cramer’s radar. Pfizer Inc. (NYSE:PFE)’s shares are down by 5.90% year-to-date, and December has been a tumultuous month for them. On Tuesday, the stock dipped by 5.2% after the firm released its full-year 2026 guidance. headline: Wall Street banked on a flurry of deals under Trump in 2025. It wasn't that simple
summary: Dealmakers expected a flood of M&A to take place in 2025 following the election of President Trump. The number of transactions didn't live up to the hype.

headline: 1 S&P 500 Stock with Impressive Fundamentals and 2 That Underwhelm
